summary: TOOK TO DEALERSHIP TODAY BECAUSE ME AND 2 OTHER PEOPLE HAVE FELT A LOT A PLAY IN THE STEERING. THEY CHECKED IT AND SAID THERE WAS NOT A PROBLEM. THIS IS MY 3RD JEEP AND THE OTHER 2 NEVER DROVE LIKE THIS ONE! PLEASE FIX THIS PROBLEM BEFORE SOMEONE DIES! I'M WAITING TO GET PULLED OVER BECAUSE SOMEONE MIGHT THINK I'M INTOXICATED. CAN'T KEEP IT IN A STRAIGHT LINE. HELP!!!'  *TR
